titles.title: Recognizing the importance of the Wisconsin Idea and the University of Wisconsin System for the benefit they have brought and continue to bring to the State of Wisconsin, the United States, and the world.

Recognizing the importance of the Wisconsin Idea and the University of Wisconsin System for the benefit they have brought and continue to bring to the State of Wisconsin, the United States, and the world.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary: Recognizes the significant contributions of the Wisconsin Idea (a policy encouraging the public university's contributions to the state) and the University of Wisconsin System to the state of Wisconsin, the United States, and the world.
